channel.title: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by Harris Interactive for LCP – Assemblée nationale, 22–23 May 2018 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Parti communiste français (GUE/NGL): 1.4–2.8%
  • La France insoumise (GUE/NGL): 10.8–13.9%
  • Parti socialiste (S&D): 7.0–9.6%
  • Europe Écologie Les Verts (Greens/EFA): 3.2–5.1%
  • La République en marche–Mouvement démocrate (ALDE): 26.4–30.8%
  • Agir, la droite constructive–Union des démocrates et indépendants (ALDE): 1.4–2.8%
  • Les Républicains (EPP): 11.7–15.0%
  • Debout la France (EFDD): 6.0–8.5%
  • Front national (ENF): 13.7–17.1%
  • Les Patriotes (EFDD): 0.6–1.6%
  • Union populaire républicaine (*): 0.6–1.6%

item.title: Opinion Poll by Viavoice for Europe Écologie Les Verts, 7–11 May 2018 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Parti communiste français (GUE/NGL): 0 seats
  • La France insoumise (GUE/NGL): 6–8 seats
  • Parti socialiste (S&D): 0–6 seats
  • Europe Écologie Les Verts (Greens/EFA): 6–9 seats
  • La République en marche–Mouvement démocrate (ALDE): 24–29 seats
  • Les Républicains (EPP): 8–11 seats
  • Debout la France (EFDD): 0–6 seats
  • Front national (ENF): 10–13 seats

item.title: Opinion Poll by Viavoice for Europe Écologie Les Verts, 7–11 May 2018 – Seat Projections for a Selection of Coalitions

  • Front national (ENF): 12.3–15.9%
